code: import React from"react";import"../styles/ExploreMore.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ExploreMore(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"explore-more-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explore-more-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"explore-more-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rule"}),"Explore More",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rule"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explore-more-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PromoCard,{title:"Loan",subtitle:"Get your car financed today",cta:"Check eligibility",imagePath:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/paisa.png",variant:"loan",onClick:()=>console.log("Open Loan eligibility")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PromoCard,{title:"Buyback",subtitle:"Commit less, drive more",cta:"Explore buyback",imagePath:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/buyback.png",variant:"buyback",onClick:()=>console.log("Open Buyback")})]})]})});}function PromoCard(_ref){let{title,subtitle,cta,imagePath,variant="loan",onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"promo-card promo-".concat(variant),role:"region","aria-labelledby":"".concat(variant,"-title"),style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(imagePath,")")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"promo-overlay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"promo-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"".concat(variant,"-title"),className:"promo-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"promo-sub",children:subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"promo-cta-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"promo-cta",onClick:onClick,children:cta})})]});}
